title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should size correctly in the property sheet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Locate a field that uses the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not have the correct size.
